English:
Beca, a freshman at Barden University, is cajoled into joining The Bellas, her
school's all-girls singing group. Injecting some much needed energy into their
repertoire, The Bellas take on their male rivals in a campus competition.


Met o.a.: Anna Kendrick, Brittany Snow, Christopher Mintz-Plasse
